title: 48 giờ lần theo dấu vết nghi phạm cướp 2 iPhone 14 Promax
description: Khi lực lượng công an ập vào nhà nghỉ, nghi phạm thực hiện vụ cướp hai chiếc điện thoại iPhone 14 Promax ở Nghệ An không nghĩ mình lại bị phát hiện.
content: Ngày 28-5, Công an huyện Diễn châu, Nghệ An đang tạm giữ hình sự Vũ Văn Đức - 18 tuổi, ngụ xã Diễn Thịnh, huyện Diễn Châu, Nghệ An - để mở rộng điều tra về hành vi . Đức là nghi phạm táo tợn dùng một vật giống súng và dao đe dọa, cướp hai chiếc điện thoại 14 Promax trên địa bàn huyện Diễn Châu. Hơn 12h trưa 23-5, hai nữ nhân viên cửa hàng điện thoại của anh C.N.T. (25 tuổi - chủ cửa hàng N.T.) đóng ở xã Diễn Thành, huyện Diễn Châu đang ở trong cửa hàng thì có một nam thanh niên vào hỏi mua điện thoại di động. Cửa hàng N.T. nằm gần quốc lộ 1, xung quanh là trường học, khu dân cư đông đúc. Tuy nhiên, do đang giờ nghỉ trưa nên ít người qua lại. Trước đó, anh T. nhận được cuộc điện thoại của một người hỏi mua hai chiếc iPhone 14 Promax chưa khui hộp trị giá khoảng 50 triệu đồng hẹn "trưa 23-5 sẽ tới lấy". "Lúc nam thanh niên này vào cửa hàng, tôi có hỏi là em có phải là người hẹn mua điện thoại từ trước hay không và đi cùng ai thì người này trả lời rất điềm tĩnh, rõ ràng", nữ nhân viên bán hàng kể lại. Thời điểm này, nam thanh niên bịt khẩu trang kín mít, đội và mặc áo chống nắng. Khi nữ nhân viên đưa điện thoại ra cho nam thanh niên xem thì người này bất ngờ rút trong người ra một vật giống súng lớn tiếng nói: "Đưa điện thoại đây không tao bắn chết". Chỉ trong ít phút, sau khi ép hai nữ nhân viên vào trong phòng khóa cửa và cướp được hai chiếc iPhone 14 Promax, nam thanh niên nhanh chóng dùng xe máy tay ga màu đỏ bỏ chạy hướng Diễn Châu - TP Vinh. Một điều tra viên cho biết quá trình điều tra, ban chuyên án gặp rất nhiều khó khăn do nghi phạm sử dụng các thủ đoạn để đối phó với cơ quan chức năng như che kín mặt, thay đổi giọng nói, sử dụng sim rác để liên lạc và xe gắn biển kiểm soát giả. Trích xuất qua camera từ cửa hàng, lực lượng công an ghi nhận toàn bộ diễn biến vụ cướp song việc nhận dạng nghi phạm rất khó khăn. Lần theo dấu vết dọc quốc lộ 1, ban chuyên án nhận định nghi phạm là người địa phương, có thời gian khảo sát cửa hàng thực hiện vụ cướp và chọn thời điểm giữa trưa đi cướp một mình. Sau khi rà soát tất cả danh sách những người có tiền án, tiền sự ở các xã, thị trấn, ban chuyên án khoanh vùng được nghi phạm Đức khi Đức đột ngột vắng mặt ở địa phương sau thời gian xảy ra vụ cướp. "Nghi phạm chạy xe máy hướng vào TP Vinh nhưng thực chất là nghi phạm bắt xe khách ra Hà Nội để lẩn trốn nhằm đánh lạc hướng điều tra", điều tra viên vụ án nói. Đến khoảng 14h chiều 25-5, Công an huyện Diễn Châu chủ trì, phối hợp Công an TP Vinh phá thành công chuyên án, bắt Đức là thủ phạm gây ra vụ cướp tài sản tại cửa hàng điện thoại N.T. khi Đức đang lẩn trốn tại một nhà nghỉ trên địa bàn phường Phúc Tân, quận Hoàn Kiếm, TP Hà Nội - cách hiện trường gây án hơn 260km. Tại cơ quan điều tra, Đức khai nhận do nợ nần và không có tiền tiêu xài nên đã nảy sinh ý định cướp tài sản và một mình thực hiện hành vi. Tài sản sau khi trộm được, Đức mang ra Hà Nội tiêu thụ.

title: Chánh án Nguyễn Hòa Bình: Tòa án đi thu thập chứng cứ 'sẽ sinh ra một vụ án kỳ cục'
description: Chánh án Nguyễn Hòa Bình nhấn mạnh quan điểm phục vụ nhân dân của tòa án là phải đảm bảo công lý, phán xử cho đúng, tuân thủ đúng pháp luật chứ không phải việc đi thu thập chứng cứ.
content: Ngày 28-5, thảo luận về Luật Tổ chức Tòa án nhân dân (sửa đổi), việc thu thập tài liệu, chứng cứ trong giải quyết , hành chính, vụ việc dân sự và các vụ việc khác thuộc thẩm quyền của tòa án được nhiều đại biểu Quốc hội quan tâm. Tòa án xét xử theo hướng chứng cứ tới đâu xét xử tới đó Nhiều ý kiến tán thành dự luật về việc tòa án không có nghĩa vụ thu thập chứng cứ. Song nhiều ý kiến không tán thành dự luật và đề nghị quy định trong một số trường hợp cần thiết, tòa án thu thập chứng cứ. Đại biểu Nguyễn Hữu Chính (chánh án Tòa án nhân dân TP Hà Nội) cho biết dự thảo quy định "các bên tự thu thập chứng cứ, giao nộp tài liệu, chứng cứ cho tòa án theo quy định của pháp luật". Tại dự luật quy định tòa án hỗ trợ thu thập tài liệu, chứng cứ bằng việc yêu cầu cơ quan, tổ chức, cá nhân cung cấp tài liệu, chứng cứ trong vụ án. Trường hợp các bên thực hiện các biện pháp cần thiết nhưng không thu thập được thì đề nghị tòa án hỗ trợ. Ông bày tỏ hoàn toàn nhất trí với nội dung trong dự thảo. Theo ông Chính, quy định phù hợp với thực tiễn và xu thế, phù hợp với các nguyên tắc pháp luật và các quy định tố tụng hiện hành. Việc thu thập tài liệu, chứng cứ thuộc về trách nhiệm của các bên trong vụ án dân sự, ... Theo nguyên tắc, đương sự khởi kiện phải cung cấp tài liệu, chứng cứ chứng minh cho yêu cầu của mình. Tòa án xét xử theo hướng chứng cứ tới đâu xét xử tới đó, tòa án không tự mình thu thập chứng cứ mà chỉ đóng vai trò hướng dẫn các cơ quan, tổ chức, cá nhân thu thập, giao nộp tài liệu, chứng cứ; yêu cầu cơ quan, tổ chức, cá nhân cung cấp tài liệu, chứng cứ theo quy định của pháp luật. Tranh luận lại với đại biểu Hương, Chính sau đó, đại biểu Nguyễn Thanh Sang (TP.HCM) cho rằng quy định tại thời điểm này chưa chín muồi, chưa phù hợp. Ông Sang nêu 3 lý do, trong đó, thứ nhất chúng ta chưa có cơ chế để cho người dân tự thu thập chứng cứ. Ví dụ ông là nguyên đơn trong vụ kiện dân sự. Ông yêu cầu bị đơn và người có quyền, nghĩa vụ liên quan cung cấp tài liệu, chứng cứ nhưng không ai cung cấp, ông không làm được gì. Bởi vì đây là quy định mà những người khác không thực hiện thì không làm được gì. Thứ hai, ông yêu cầu ngân hàng sao kê tài khoản của bị đơn là người nợ tôi, ngân hàng cũng không thực hiện, ông cũng không làm được gì. Thứ ba, yêu cầu phòng tài nguyên và môi trường cung cấp tài liệu, chứng cứ cho ông thì cũng không ai cung cấp. Lý do, ông không phải là cơ quan nhà nước có thẩm quyền để các cơ quan này cung cấp chứng cứ trong vụ án hành chính ông kiện cơ quan nhà nước. Mà cơ quan nhà nước thì làm sao cung cấp chứng cứ cho bị đơn là ông để ông thực hiện quyền của mình được cho nên rất khó khăn, nên hiện tại quyền này là cho người dân, nó rất khó thực hiện... Không có nước nào tòa án đi thu thập chứng cứ, xử theo tài liệu của mình Giải trình sau đó, Chánh án Nguyễn Hòa Bình cho biết dự thảo đã được tiếp thu, chỉnh lý theo hướng tòa án hướng dẫn, hỗ trợ các bên thu thập chứng cứ. Cụ thể thế nào sau này sẽ có hướng dẫn. Dẫn lại ý kiến đại biểu cho rằng các vụ án không có luật sư, tòa phải có trách nhiệm đi thu thập chứng cứ cho người dân, khẳng định "không có nước nào làm". "Đi kiện, anh phải có chứng cứ để bảo đảm anh thắng, chứ không phải anh mang đơn đến, tòa phục vụ nhân dân nên tòa phải đi thu thập chứng cứ. Nguyên đơn cũng là nhân dân, bị đơn cũng là nhân dân". Theo ông, nếu tòa phục vụ nguyên đơn đi thu thập chứng cứ, rồi tòa lại phục vụ bị đơn tiếp tục đi thu thập chứng cứ "sẽ sinh ra một vụ án kỳ cục" là hai bên kiện nhau. Còn tòa án đi thu thập chứng cứ và xử theo tài liệu của mình thu thập thì đây là loại án không có một nước nào làm. Chánh án Nguyễn Hòa Bình nhấn mạnh quan điểm "phục vụ nhân dân của tòa án là phải đảm bảo công lý, phán xử cho đúng, tuân thủ đúng pháp luật chứ không phải việc đi thu thập chứng cứ".

title: Điều dưỡng UMC nâng cao chất lượng, chăm sóc người bệnh tốt hơn
description: Bệnh viện Đại học Y Dược TP.HCM vừa tổ chức lễ kỷ niệm ngày Quốc tế điều dưỡng với chủ đề: “Điều dưỡng chúng tôi – tương lai chúng ta – Đầu tư vào điều dưỡng – giảm chi phí y tế”.

title: Doanh nhân Lê Nguyễn Thị Hoàng Oanh đoạt danh hiệu Hoa hậu Nhân ái
description: Danh hiệu Hoa hậu nhân ái - Hoa hậu Doanh nhân Quốc gia Việt Nam 2024 chính thức thuộc về Doanh nhân Lê Nguyễn Thị Hoàng Oanh - SBD 179, đến từ Đồng Tháp.
content: Tối 17-5, đêm chung kết của cuộc thi Hoa hậu Doanh nhân Quốc gia Việt Nam 2024 đã diễn ra tại Trung tâm Văn hoá tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu. Sau hơn 2 tiếng diễn ra đêm thi, ngôi vị cao nhất thuộc về doanh nhân Nguyễn Thị Tuyết Hồng, Á hậu 1 thuộc về doanh nhân Nguyễn Thị Mỹ Duyên, đồng Á hậu 2 thuộc về doanh nhân Phạm Thị Sen và doanh nhân Đặng Thị Tân. Đồng Á hậu 3 được trao cho doanh nhân Nguyễn Hiền Trang và doanh nhân Trần Thị Phương Thảo. Doanh nhân Lê Nguyễn Thị Hoàng Oanh đã đoạt danh hiệu Hoa hậu Nhân ái với dự án "Vòng tay yêu thương".

title: Vì sao biên lợi nhuận 4 tháng đầu năm của PNJ giảm?
description: Vàng lập đỉnh đẩy giá đầu vào lên cao, ngoài ra còn làm thay đổi hành vi tiêu dùng khiến biên lợi nhuận gộp 4 tháng đầu năm của PNJ vơi đi so với cùng kỳ.
content: Theo báo cáo kết quả kinh doanh mới đây, lợi nhuận gộp trung bình 4 tháng của công ty đạt 17%, giảm so với mức 19,1% cùng kỳ năm 2023. Tổng chi phí hoạt động tăng 29,3% so với cùng kỳ. Điều này làm tỉ lệ chi phí hoạt động trên lợi nhuận gộp 4 tháng cũng nhích từ 52% lên mức 57%. Ban lãnh đạo cho biết biên lãi gộp vơi bớt do sự thay đổi cơ cấu hàng bán trong kênh lẻ, cơ cấu doanh thu, sự biến động giá nguyên liệu và các yếu tố đầu vào khác. Trong đó, biến động giá vàng và thay đổi hành vi tiêu dùng là nguyên nhân trọng yếu. Mảng kinh doanh cốt lõi của doanh nghiệp này là trang sức. Do đó việc giá vàng tăng dẫn đến tăng giá nguyên liệu đầu vào tạo ra khó khăn cho hoạt động kinh doanh. Từ cuối năm ngoái đến nay, kim loại quý này liên tục lập đỉnh mới về giá. Sau khi vượt 70 triệu đồng vào giữa tháng 10-2023, giá vàng từng bước leo lên đỉnh giá mới và vượt 80 triệu đồng một lượng trong những ngày cuối năm. Mặt bằng giá cao duy trì suốt 3 tháng đầu năm, thị trường bắt đầu quay cuồng khi bước sang tháng 4. Có nhiều phiên liên tiếp, kim loại quý leo dốc dựng đứng, tăng hàng triệu đồng mỗi lượng chỉ sau một đêm và giữ trên khung 85 triệu đồng. Giá vàng tăng cũng làm thay đổi hành vi tiêu dùng. Bối cảnh kinh tế hiện nay chưa ổn định, lãi suất ngân hàng thấp, các kênh đầu tư khác như chứng khoán vẫn rung lắc, bất động sản chưa rã băng. Do đó, vàng - vốn có tính an toàn cao, nay được xem như kênh tiềm năng và hấp dẫn, khi giá tăng vọt chỉ trong thời gian ngắn. Hiện người dân chuộng mua vàng 24K với mục tiêu phòng thủ và đầu tư. Nhu cầu này cao khác hẳn so với những năm trước khi khách hàng tìm đến PNJ chủ yếu qua trang sức và lựa chọn sản phẩm chú trọng tính thời trang. Trong khi đó, biên lợi nhuận các sản phẩm vàng 24K rất thấp, không tới 1%. Đây cũng không phải mảng kinh doanh chính của công ty. Nhóm phân tích của Mirae Asset Việt Nam (MASVN) cho rằng giá vàng tăng mang đến tác động nhiều mặt. Diễn biến trên có thể thu hút đầu cơ tích trữ, hỗ trợ dòng tiền của công ty. Mặt khác, do kênh bán lẻ trang sức mới là trụ cột lợi nhuận của công ty (chiếm gần 57%), MASVN cho rằng giá vàng tăng sẽ gây áp lực lên biên lợi nhuận gộp bán lẻ. Lý do là công ty không phải lúc nào cũng có thể đẩy chi phí cho khách hàng. Ngoài ra, giá trang sức cao hơn có thể cản trở nhu cầu và dẫn đến khối lượng bán hàng thấp hơn. Tuy trong bối cảnh nhiều biến động, công ty vẫn đề ra mục tiêu doanh thu khoảng 37.148 tỉ đồng và lợi nhuận sau thuế là 2.089 tỉ đồng. Đây là những con số kỉ lục trong lịch sử hoạt động của PNJ. Sức mua bán lẻ tiêu dùng nội địa chưa hồi phục như kỳ vọng nhưng theo nhiều nhóm phân tích, đây là vấn đề trong ngắn hạn. Về trung và dài hạn, thị trường Việt Nam được nhiều đơn vị dự báo còn tiềm năng tăng trưởng lớn. Nhiều đơn vị phân tích thị trường cho rằng người Việt vẫn đang gia tăng tích sản, thúc đẩy tiêu dùng mạnh hơn. Không chỉ các nhu cầu cơ bản, người tiêu dùng còn có xu hướng chuyển dịch sang hàng hóa, dịch vụ không thiết yếu, trong đó khó thể thiếu kim hoàn và trang sức. Với triển vọng trên, PNJ có nhiều lợi thế. Công ty là thương hiệu bán lẻ trang sức hàng đầu Việt Nam với mạng lưới hơn 400 cửa hàng có mặt 55/63 tỉnh, thành cả nước. Độ uy tín của doanh nghiệp được chứng minh trong suốt 36 năm hoạt động. Đơn vị này cũng sở hữu đội ngũ lao động chất lượng nhờ chiến lược làm giàu nguồn nhân lực, giúp nhân viên có thêm cơ hội sáng tạo, cống hiến. Ngoài ra, công ty đang chứng minh năng lực trong mảng chế tác kim hoàn khi cung cấp các sản phẩm trang sức đa dạng, phù hợp với nhiều phân khúc khách hàng. Việc tăng tỉ trọng các sản phẩm trang sức thiết kế được các chuyên gia phân tích từ VNDirect đánh giá là một trong những chiến lược giúp cải thiện biên lãi gộp. Nhờ ứng dụng chuyển đổi số, công ty cũng nâng cao khả năng phân tích dữ liệu, từ đó đưa ra các sản phẩm phù hợp với thị hiếu người tiêu dùng. Các chiến dịch tiếp thị và truyền thông của hãng cũng được người tiêu dùng đánh giá sáng tạo và có tính tác động. Điển hình, công ty đã dày công nghiên cứu thiết kế và chế tác các bộ sản phẩm trang sức mang tính ứng dụng cao, phù hợp với nhu cầu người dùng trong bối cảnh hiện nay. Bên cạnh đó, công ty còn tổ chức "Hành trình trang sức xuyên Việt" trong 60 ngày với quy mô trên toàn quốc, đã tạo dấu ấn mạnh mẽ với khách hàng bởi ý tưởng đột phá, tôn vinh vẻ đẹp đa sắc giữa đời thường, truyền cảm hứng cho mỗi người luôn vững tin vào vẻ đẹp riêng của bản thân, đã thu hút hơn 5.000 người tham gia check-in... Trong chiến lược phát triển kinh doanh mới, ban lãnh đạo công ty xác định đầu tư thử nghiệm các mô hình tiếp cận khách hàng hiện đại làm động lực phát triển cho tương lai, hình thành hệ sinh thái toàn diện và giữ vị trí hàng đầu thị trường bán lẻ trang sức trong dài hạn. Ngoài ra, trong giai đoạn này, PNJ sẽ tích cực đẩy mạnh quá trình theo dõi và chuẩn bị đường hướng phát triển cho những năm tiếp theo.

title: Tập trung giải quyết vấn đề an toàn, bảo mật cho thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt
description: Đó là một trong những nội dung quan trọng của chương trình "Ngày không tiền mặt" năm 2024 được đưa ra tại họp báo "Thúc đẩy phát triển thanh toán không tiền mặt an toàn", tổ chức chiều 28-5.
content: Sự kiện do báo phối hợp Vụ Thanh toán - Ngân hàng Nhà nước (NHNN) tổ chức. Thanh toán không tiền mặt tăng trưởng ấn tượng, nhưng còn nhiều rủi ro Ông Trần Xuân Toàn, phó tổng biên tập báo trưởng ban tổ chức, chia sẻ: "Cách đây 5 năm khi bắt đầu tổ chức chương trình này, chúng tôi không ngờ có sự thay đổi nhanh như vậy. Nhưng bước vào năm thứ 6 của chương trình, chúng tôi vô cùng hạnh phúc vì đã nhìn thấy sự thay đổi rất lớn trong hằng ngày". Kể lại câu chuyện vừa diễn ra sáng cùng ngày, ông Toàn cho biết có một cuộc hẹn gấp, lại đang lúc kẹt xe nên đã phải đặt ngay một chuyến xe công nghệ để đi gặp đối tác. “Khi tôi xuống xe hỏi tài xế có tài khoản MoMo không, vì chỉ sau 2 động tác là có thể thanh toán ngay. Anh tài xế rút ngay trong túi một chiếc thẻ ép nhựa có in mã QR của ngân hàng và tôi chỉ cần quét thẻ thanh toán”. Câu chuyện nhỏ nhưng cho thấy hoạt động thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt đã rất phổ biến, len lỏi vào mọi ngóc ngách đời sống hằng ngày của người dân. Về khía cạnh an toàn, bảo mật, ông Toàn cho biết song song với sự phát triển nhanh của hoạt động thanh toán và công nghệ thanh toán, cũng dẫn đến phát sinh những vấn đề bảo mật, an ninh an toàn. Chẳng hạn thời gian qua, rất nhiều bài báo, video clip, câu chuyện podcast chia sẻ những câu chuyện về chiếm quyền tài khoản, hack tài khoản cá nhân, chiếm đoạt tiền của người dân... Những câu chuyện này đã phần nào đó khiến người dân hoang mang, lo ngại khi thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt. “Đó là lý do chúng tôi tổ chức chuỗi sự kiện thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt năm nay với chủ đề: “Thúc đẩy thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt an toàn, bảo mật””, ông Toàn nói. Thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt tăng trưởng ấn tượng Phát biểu tại họp báo, ông Lê Anh Dũng, phó vụ trưởng Vụ Thanh toán, Ngân hàng Nhà nước, cho biết đến hết năm 2023, Việt Nam có hơn 182 triệu tài khoản thanh toán cá nhân và có 87,08% người trưởng thành sở hữu tài khoản thanh toán. Hơn 147 triệu thẻ ngân hàng đang lưu hành và 32,77 triệu ví điện tử đang hoạt động. Theo ông Lê Anh Dũng, những con số tăng trưởng cao, tích cực về thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt đã cho thấy sự phổ cập dịch vụ ngân hàng và thành công trong tạo lập, phát triển hệ sinh thái số. Số lượng giao dịch thanh toán qua kênh Internet và Mobile bình quân giai đoạn 2021-2023 lần lượt tăng trưởng ở mức 52% và 103,3%; tăng trưởng về số lượng và giá trị thanh toán qua phương thức QR Code đạt hơn 170%. Về mở tài khoản qua phương thức eKYC, 40 ngân hàng báo cáo đã triển khai chính thức với gần 35 triệu tài khoản thanh toán mở bằng eKYC đang hoạt động. Về đảm bảo an toàn, an ninh mạng cho hoạt động thanh toán, NHNN đã thường xuyên có các văn bản chỉ đạo toàn ngành về tăng cường đảm bảo an ninh, an toàn hoạt động thanh toán, trong đó yêu cầu các tổ chức tín dụng, trung gian thanh toán rà soát quy trình, quy định nội bộ. Ưu tiên áp dụng mở tài khoản thanh toán/ví điện tử bằng phương tiện điện tử (eKYC) đối với khách hàng sử dụng căn cước công dân gắn chip. Tăng cường công tác quản lý rủi ro, thực hiện hậu kiểm 100% đối với các tài khoản/ví điện tử mở bằng eKYC... Ngoài ra, NHNN đã phối hợp với Bộ Công an tổ chức kiểm tra về an toàn hệ thống thông tin và hoạt động mở, sử dụng tài khoản thanh toán tại nhiều tổ chức tín dụng, trung gian thanh toán. NHNN cũng thường xuyên chỉ đạo các đơn vị trong ngành ngân hàng làm tốt công tác truyền thông để nâng cao nhận thức về an toàn thông tin, phòng chống lừa đảo, gian lận thanh toán cho toàn thể cán bộ ngành ngân hàng và khách hàng. Và cuối cùng, ngành ngân hàng đã và đang tích cực phối hợp với Bộ Công an triển khai Đề án 06 ứng dụng dữ liệu dân cư phục vụ cho công tác làm sạch dữ liệu, xác minh thông tin khách hàng thông qua căn cước công dân gắn chip, tài khoản VneID và hỗ trợ trong việc cung ứng sản phẩm, dịch vụ ngân hàng.

title: Trình Chủ tịch nước tặng quà 1,38 triệu người có công
description: Chính phủ vừa trình Chủ tịch nước tặng quà cho người có công với cách mạng dịp 27-7 với tổng kinh phí gần 420 tỉ đồng.
content: Phó thủ tướng Trần Hồng Hà vừa ủy quyền cho Bộ trưởng Bộ Lao động - Thương binh và Xã hội Đào Ngọc Dung trình Chủ tịch nước Tô Lâm tặng quà cho với cách mạng nhân dịp 77 năm Ngày Thương binh - Liệt sĩ (27-7-1947 - 27-7-2024). Cụ thể, mức quà tặng cho các đối tượng người có công với cách mạng vẫn giữ nguyên như năm 2023 với hai mức 600.000 đồng và 300.000 đồng. Dự kiến có khoảng 1,38 triệu người có công với cách mạng thụ hưởng quà tặng trên. Cụ thể, mức quà 600.000 đồng dành tặng đang hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng và những cá nhân đã có quyết định phong tặng danh hiệu Bà mẹ Việt Nam anh hùng trước ngày 28-7-2024, nhưng chưa hoàn tất thủ tục hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng. Thương binh, người hưởng chính sách như thương binh, thương binh loại B, bệnh binh suy giảm khả năng lao động từ 81% trở lên đang hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng. Các đối tượng khác trong nhóm này còn có người hoạt động kháng chiến bị nhiễm chất độc hóa học suy giảm khả năng lao động từ 81% trở lên đang hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng, thân nhân liệt sĩ đang hưởng trợ cấp tuất nuôi dưỡng hằng tháng và thân nhân của hai liệt sĩ trở lên đang được hưởng trợ cấp tuất hằng tháng. Mức quà 300.000 đồng dành tặng thương binh, người hưởng chính sách như thương binh, thương binh loại B, bệnh binh có tỉ lệ tổn thương cơ thể từ 80% trở xuống đang hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng. Thương binh hưởng chế độ mất sức lao động. Người hoạt động kháng chiến bị nhiễm chất độc hóa học suy giảm khả năng lao động từ 80% trở xuống đang hưởng trợ cấp ưu đãi hằng tháng, đại diện thân nhân liệt sĩ, người thờ cúng liệt sĩ (trường hợp liệt sĩ không còn thân nhân) cũng hưởng mức quà 300.000 đồng.

title: Phát hiện quảng cáo BOMBIT sai quy định các sản phẩm liên quan ‘công nghệ tế bào gốc’
description: Thanh tra Sở Y tế TP.HCM phối hợp với chính quyền địa phương đã tiến hành kiểm tra đột xuất công ty nhập khẩu, phân phối và 2 cơ sở hợp tác kinh doanh các sản phẩm nhãn hàng BOMBIT trên địa bàn TP.HCM.
content: Ngày 28-5, theo thông tin từ Sở Y tế TP.HCM, tổ công tác đặc biệt Sở Y tế đã phát hiện tài khoản mạng xã hội Facebook " Ehlbio Viet Nam" có đăng tải nội dung quảng cáo sản phẩm BOMBIT HSC - Dịch chiết tế bào trung mô tiên phong trên thị trường châu Á. Kiểm tra 2 cơ sở hợp tác kinh doanh các sản phẩm nhãn hàng BOMBIT Thanh tra Sở Y tế TP.HCM phối hợp với chính quyền địa phương đã tiến hành kiểm tra đột xuất công ty nhập khẩu, phân phối và 2 cơ sở hợp tác kinh doanh các sản phẩm nhãn hàng BOMBIT trên địa bàn TP.HCM. Công ty TNHH Xuất nhập khẩu Cindel Tox, quận 1, TP.HCM, có giấy chứng nhận đăng ký kinh doanh, thực hiện nhập khẩu, kinh doanh thiết bị y tế (các sản phẩm mang nhãn hiệu dung dịch điều trị da BOMBIT) và mỹ phẩm (các sản phẩm mỹ phẩm thuộc nhãn hàng CINDEL TOX). Công ty xuất trình được hồ sơ công bố tiêu chuẩn, lưu hành thiết bị y tế loại A (6 số công bố) nhưng không có giấy chứng nhận đạt tiêu chuẩn quản lý chất lượng ISO13485 theo quy định khoản 2, điều 26 nghị định số 98/2021/NĐ-CP và 5 số tiếp nhận công bố sản phẩm mỹ phẩm. Một tổ công tác đặc biệt khác tiến hành kiểm tra cùng lúc tại quận 10 nơi đăng ký hoạt động hộ kinh doanh "Bo Clinic" do UBND quận 10 cấp hoạt động lĩnh vực chăm sóc da. Tuy nhiên, qua kiểm tra ghi nhận tại tầng 1 có khách hàng đang được nhân viên thực hiện dịch vụ bằng máy IPL. Tại quầy tiếp nhận khách hàng, đoàn còn phát hiện 2 sổ dịch vụ, các phiếu chăm sóc da kỹ thuật cao ghi các dịch vụ như tiêm filler, tiêm Bombit, laser nhũ hoa, đốt mụn thịt... Đồng thời, đoàn còn phát hiện các pano quảng cáo sản phẩm Bombit, 1 cuốn tài liệu có nội dung Bombit trao tặng "bác sĩ" cho làn da của bạn. Kiểm tra một hộ kinh doanh khác ở TP Thủ Đức. Hộ này đăng ký hoạt động hộ kinh doanh "JMY Beauty" do UBND TP Thủ Đức cấp hoạt động lĩnh vực . Thế nhưng lại quảng cáo trên trang mạng xã hội Facebook "JMY Beauty - Viện trẻ hóa và điều trị nám" với nội dung Phòng khám chuyên khoa da liễu - Đội ngũ bác sĩ chuyên khoa da liễu hàng đầu Việt Nam - Điều trị và trẻ hóa da công nghệ cao - Dược mỹ phẩm Châu Âu chính hãng, uy tín". Tổ công tác ghi nhận tại cơ sơ có trưng bày 5 vỏ hộp sản phẩm BOMBIT HSC. Đối với 2 cơ sở chăm sóc da tại quận 10 và TP Thủ Đức hiện nay chưa được Sở Y tế TP.HCM cấp giấy phép hoạt động lĩnh vực khám bệnh, chữa bệnh. Thanh tra sở tiếp tục mời chủ hộ kinh doanh 2 cơ sở nêu trên tiếp tục làm rõ hoạt động khám bệnh, chữa bệnh. Thanh tra Sở Y tế TP cũng đang tiếp tục làm rõ nội dung "Dịch chiết Human - Exosome từ mô mỡ hỗ trợ điều trị sẹo, tái tạo tăng sinh tế bào da, phục hồi toàn diện BOMBIT HSC", "Công nghệ tế bào gốc Human - Exosome từ mô mỡ..." và đang hoàn tất thủ tục xử phạt vi phạm hành chính đối với các hành vi vi phạm của Công ty TNHH xuất nhập khẩu CINDEL TOX. Điều đáng lưu ý là tài liệu trong hồ sơ công bố tiêu chuẩn áp dụng đối với thiết bị y tế thuộc loại A không đảm bảo tính hợp pháp theo quy định của pháp luật. Đồng thời công ty cũng vi phạm về nhãn hàng hóa, quảng cáo các sản phẩm, hàng hóa, dịch vụ đặc biệt mà không được cơ quan nhà nước có thẩm quyền xác nhận nội dung trước khi thực hiện quảng cáo; kinh doanh mỹ phẩm có công thức không đúng với hồ sơ công bố đã được duyệt. Theo Sở Y tế TP.HCM, người dân không nên mua, sử dụng các sản phẩm không rõ nguồn gốc xuất xứ, không đảm bảo chất lượng nói trên.

title: Hải Phòng giảm 50 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã giai đoạn 2023-2025
description: Ngày 28-5, các đại biểu HĐND TP Hải Phòng khóa XVI (nhiệm kỳ 2021-2026) đã thông qua đề án sắp xếp đơn vị hành chính cấp xã giai đoạn 2023-2025.
content: Theo đó, có 41 thuộc 9 quận, huyện (Ngô Quyền, Kiến An, Lê Chân, Hồng Bàng, Kiến Thụy, Tiên Lãng, Vĩnh Bảo, An Dương, Thủy Nguyên) thuộc diện phải sắp xếp trong giai đoạn 2023-2025. Sau khi sắp xếp, toàn thành phố có 15 đơn vị hành chính cấp quận, huyện (8 quận, 1 thành phố và 6 huyện) với 167 xã, phường, thị trấn (79 phường, 7 thị trấn và 81 xã) - giảm 50 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã. Đồng thời, thành phố Hải Phòng dôi dư hơn 1.100 cán bộ, công chức, viên chức. Sở Nội vụ TP Hải Phòng đề xuất phương án cán bộ đủ tiêu chuẩn, điều kiện theo quy định sẽ sắp xếp, điều động sang xã, phường khác còn chỉ tiêu biên chế. Đối với trường hợp không bố trí được sang đơn vị khác thì động viên hoặc thôi việc. Việc giảm đơn vị hành chính cấp xã tại Hải Phòng được thực hiện theo nghị quyết của Quốc hội về việc sắp xếp đơn vị hành chính cấp huyện, cấp xã giai đoạn 2023-2030. Trước khi sắp xếp, Hải Phòng có 217 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã, 15 đơn vị hành chính cấp huyện với dân số hơn 2,31 triệu người. Bên cạnh đề án sắp xếp đơn vị hành chính cấp xã giai đoạn 2023-2025, các đại biểu tham dự kỳ họp thứ 16 cũng đã nhất trí thông qua những đề án quan trọng khác như: điều chỉnh địa giới đơn vị hành chính, thành lập thành phố Thủy Nguyên thuộc thành phố Hải Phòng và thành lập các phường, xã thuộc thành phố Thủy Nguyên. Đề án thành lập quận An Dương và các phường thuộc quận An Dương; Đề án điều chỉnh địa giới đơn vị hành chính, thành lập các phường mới thuộc quận Hồng Bàng. Ông Phạm Văn Lập - chủ tịch HĐND thành phố Hải Phòng - nhấn mạnh đây là 4 nội dung quan trọng nhằm khai thác hiệu quả các nguồn lực, mở rộng không gian quy hoạch đầu tư, - xã hội, góp phần xây dựng hệ thống chính trị, bộ máy chính quyền các cấp của thành phố tinh gọn, hoạt động hiệu lực, hiệu quả. Kỳ họp lần này cũng thông qua đề án phân loại đô thị Thủy Nguyên đạt tiêu chí đô thị loại III để trình các cơ quan chức năng xem xét, quyết định. Đây cũng là hồ sơ bắt buộc nhằm hoàn thiện đề án thành lập thành phố Thủy Nguyên.

title: 안산문화원·안산시마을만들기지원센터 업무협약식
creator: 문인호 기자
description: 지난 27일 경기 안산문화원은 안산의 역사문화콘텐츠 개발 및 육성을 위하여 안산시마을만들기지원센터와 업무협약식을 맺었다.안산문화원 원장실에서 진행된 이번 업무협약식에는 양 기관의 관계자들이 참석하여 제27회 성호문화제에 앞서 협약을 맺음으로써 성호 이익선생의 '성호사설(星湖僿說)'에 기록된 청명주와 관련된 기획부스 운영을 협의하고, 향후 안산의 원천콘텐츠를 활용해 다양한 문화체험프로그램 개발을 본격화 하기로 했다.주요 협력 사항으로 △안산 향토 문화를 계승하고 발굴·발전할 수 있는 체계 마련, △시민들이
content: 지난 27일 경기 안산문화원은 안산의 역사문화콘텐츠 개발 및 육성을 위하여 안산시마을만들기지원센터와 업무협약식을 맺었다. 안산문화원 원장실에서 진행된 이번 업무협약식에는 양 기관의 관계자들이 참석하여 제27회 성호문화제에 앞서 협약을 맺음으로써 성호 이익선생의 '성호사설(星湖僿說)'에 기록된 청명주와 관련된 기획부스 운영을 협의하고, 향후 안산의 원천콘텐츠를 활용해 다양한 문화체험프로그램 개발을 본격화 하기로 했다. 주요 협력 사항으로 △안산 향토 문화를 계승하고 발굴·발전할 수 있는 체계 마련, △시민들이 자발적으로 안산의 역사·문화 콘텐츠 생산할 수 있는 환경 조성, △안산의 유무형 콘텐츠 생산 및 확산 등이 있다. 민화식 안산문화원장은 “살기 좋은 안산을 만들고자 하는 각 기관의 공통된 인식으로 이번 협약식을 맺게 되었다. 각 기관의 영역에서 살릴 수 있는 고유분야에 대한 역량 및 다양한 자원을 통해 안산의 향토 문화가 계승되고 문화와 전통이 살아 있는 안산이 만들어지도록 노력을 다할 것이다”고 밝혔다. 이현선 안산시마을만들기지원센터장은 “이번 업무 협약은 안산에 살고 있는 주민들에게 안산의 우수한 문화역사를 알려 자긍심을 고취하고 공동체 의식을 강화하여 안산의 마을만들기 문화가 확산되는 좋은 기회가 되기를 소망한다”고 말했다. 한편, 이번 협약을 맺은 결과물은 제27회 성호문화제 기간 중에 첫 선을 보일 예정으로 ‘나는 청명주를 가장 좋아한다’는 주제로 성호이익 선생이 언급한 청명주(淸明酒)를 가지고 꾸며진 기획부스가 운영된다. 이를 시작으로 지속적인 협력과 교류를 통해 지역문화 재창출에 기여하고자 하는 양 기관의 협약은 지역의 역사문화콘텐츠를 재해석하여 현대의 문화와 접목한 프로그램 개발, 육성에 벌써부터 많은 이들의 기대를 모으고 있다. [신아일보] 안산/문인호 기자

title: Ấn tượng với tủ sách miễn phí ven đường
description: Chiếc tủ sách vuông vắn đặt trên một chân gỗ chắc chắn, giống mô hình ngôi nhà đồ chơi nằm ven đường và miễn phí cho mọi người.
content: Trong chuyến đi thăm con gái đang học tại thành phố Mount Carmel (Mỹ) vừa qua, tôi có dịp rảo bước cùng con đến trường và tình cờ nhận được lộc sách ở bên đường. Ngôi trường con tôi học tọa lạc tại Mount Carmel, một thành phố thuộc tiểu bang Illinois, Mỹ. Từ nơi tôi thuê ở đến trường của con cách khoảng 30 phút đi bộ. Buổi sáng trời nắng đẹp, chúng tôi vừa đi vừa mải mê ngắm nhìn cảnh vật xung quanh với những ngôi nhà đẹp cùng bãi cỏ, cây xanh thật trong lành. Bất chợt nhìn thấy một tủ gỗ xinh xắn dựng bên đường, con trai tôi liền chạy tới khám phá. Chiếc tủ vuông vắn được đặt trên một chân gỗ chắc chắn, vẻ ngoài thoạt nhìn trông giống mô hình ngôi nhà đồ chơi. Bên dưới tủ có đặt tấm bảng ghi dòng chữ "Little Free Library" (Thư viện nhỏ miễn phí). Cánh cửa tủ chỉ khép hờ bằng cái móc nhỏ, mở ra bên trong là rất nhiều cuốn sách đủ thể loại được xếp ngay ngắn. Theo nội dung tấm bảng thì đây là nơi mọi người có thể mang sách đến để trao đổi, cho tặng, hoặc chọn lấy một cuốn sách yêu thích mang về đọc. Ấn tượng trước đáng yêu này, tôi thử tìm hiểu thì được biết Little Free Library là một tổ chức phi lợi nhuận có trụ sở tại St. Paul, Minnesota, với sứ mệnh góp phần xây dựng cộng đồng, truyền cảm hứng cho độc giả và mở rộng khả năng tiếp cận sách cho tất cả mọi người. Hoạt động của Little Free Library còn hướng đến mục tiêu nhằm cải thiện khả năng đọc, viết của trẻ, bởi nhiều nghiên cứu đã chỉ ra rằng càng có nhiều sách trong hoặc gần nhà thì trẻ càng có nhiều khả năng học và thích đọc. Theo thông tin từ tổ chức (littlefreelibrary.org), đến nay đã có hơn 175.000 tủ sách Little Free Library xuất hiện trên khắp nước Mỹ và khoảng 120 quốc gia. Hơn 400 triệu cuốn sách đã được chia sẻ thông qua mạng lưới các tủ trao đổi sách miễn phí lắp đặt ở các nơi công cộng, trung tâm cộng đồng, trường học, công viên và các địa điểm dễ tiếp cận khác. Tủ sách xinh xắn ven đường ở Mount Carmel cũng thuộc chương trình của Little Free Library, được đặt gần một trường tiểu học. Thông qua việc tham gia lắp đặt tủ sách và chia sẻ sách cùng nhau, có thể thấy những thư viện mini miễn phí này là một cách tuyệt vời để gắn kết cộng đồng của cư dân trong vùng, đồng thời góp phần duy trì và phát triển . Những người hào hứng nhất với tủ sách chắc chắn là những đứa trẻ trong khu vực, bởi chúng đã có thêm sân chơi để xúm xít vui đùa và đọc sách. Giá như mỗi khu phố ở chỗ chúng ta có những tủ sách miễn phí nho nhỏ này, chắc rằng mùa hè của con trẻ sẽ thêm thú vị biết bao.

title: اولین واکنش ستاره ژیمناستیک به پرچمداری در پاریس
description: ستاره تیم ملی ژیمناستیک ایران که این رشته را برای اولین بار بعد از انقلاب صاحب سهمیه المپیک کرد، یکی از پرچمداران کاروان ایران در افتتاحیه خواهد بود.
content: به گزارش "ورزش سه"، مهدی الفتی که سال گذشته با کسب مدال نقره بازی های آسیایی هانگژو خودش را در حد یک ستاره مطرح کرد، امسال نیز توانست با کسب سهمیه المپیک تاریخ سازی کند. او امروز توسط هیات اجرایی کمیته ملی المپیک به عنوان یکی از پرچمداران کاروان ایران در افتتاحیه المپیک 2024 پاریس انتخاب شد. الفتی در خصوص اینکه به عنوان پرچمدار کاروان ایران در المپیک پاریس انتخاب شده، گفت: از شنیدن این خبر، خوشحال و هیجان‌زده هستم. پرچمداری کاروان کشورمان افتخار بسیار بزرگی است و امیدوارم شایستگی این افتخار را داشته باشم. این افتخار به اندازه کسب سهمیه المپیک برای من مهم است و خدا را شاکرم که این اتفاق بزرگ و تاریخی برای من رخ داد. باید از مسئولان کمیته ملی المپیک تشکر کنم که من را لایق پرچمداری کاروان ایران دانستند. وی در ادامه عنوان کرد: در حال حاضر تمریناتم را برای حضوری موفق در المپیک پاریس در قزوین دنبال می‌کنم. پرچمداری کاروان ایران روحیه مضاعفی به من داده تا بتوانم تمرینات سخت و طاقت فرسا را انجام دهم. خوشبختانه وزارت ورزش، کمیته ملی المپیک و فدراسیون ژیمناستیک در این مدت حمایت‌های زیادی از من داشتند و باید از آنها تقدیر و تشکر کنم. الفتی در پایان گفت: از مردم خوب کشورم درخواست می‌کنم دعاگوی من و همه ورزشکاران ایران که در المپیک پاریس به میدان خواهند رفت باشند. امیدوارم نمایندگان شایسته ای برای آنها در این رویداد باشیم.

title: Prioritize Your Mental Health With Zong Sehat Kahani & Enjoy Exclusive Discount!
creator: Laiba Mohsin

title: Schützenball in Sechshelden
description: Kurz notiert
content: Haiger-Sechshelden. Der Schützenverein Sechhelden lädt für Samstag, 1. Juni, zum Schützenball ein. Livemusik kommt von Mir Zwo. Neben der Krönung des neuen Königspaares findet auch die Siegerehrung des Ortspokalschießens statt. Los geht es um 19.30 Uhr im Schützenhaus in Sechshelden. Für das leibliche Wohl ist gesorgt. Der Eintritt kostet fünf Euro.

title: Johann Rupert handily outperforms Aliko Dangote in 2024 so far
creator: Chinedu Okafor
description: Nigerian billionaire Aliko Dangote continues to inch slightly ahead of South Africa’s Johann Rupert, in the spot for Africa’s richest person. However, despite Dangote's ambitious oil-refining venture, the South African billionaire has held his own, outperforming Dangote in wealth accumulation from year-to-date. Johann is still over a billion dollars below Dangote in their listed net worth.
content: with Johann Rupert as Africa’s richest man, with a net worth of $10.3 billion compared to Dangote’s $9.5 billion. This, however, would not last as in an impressive push that saw him outperform the likes of Jeff Bezos, and Bill Gates, at the end of the first month of the year. During that period, the CEO of the profound Dangote group crossed the $20 billion mark, as his last change in valuation at the time came in at +$282 million, while his year-to-date (YTD) change was a staggering +$6.91 billion. The reason for this impressive growth was the performance of the Dangote cement company which surpassed standing as the first Nigerian company to do so. Currently, the net worths of both billionaires tell a different tale from their January figures, with Dangote’s being way lower at $14.8 billion and Johann’s being significantly higher at $13.5 billion, according to Their current performance based on Bloomberg’s YTD change also shows that Johann has earned $1.10 billion, while Dangote has lost $240 million. This is despite the fact that the Dangote refinery, the world's largest single-train refinery, has begun operations in Nigeria which is considered Africa’s largest market. However, the Nigerian billionaire has recorded some significant wins in recent weeks. Dangote recently ranked the 6th richest manufacturing billionaire in the world. The refinery was also ranked above Europe's ten largest refineries in capacity by Bloomberg. There are also estimations that once the Dangote refinery is fully in operation, it could significantly dent the $17 billion European oil market. However, the challenge for the Dangote refinery remains the Oil theft and pipeline vandalism that has persisted in the country for decades, making it difficult for the nation to satisfy the Dangote Refinery's daily processing supply quota. The refinery is currently operating at about 300,000 barrels per day, which is nearly half of its nameplate capacity, based on the average estimate provided by analysts at WoodMac, FGE, and Citac. Johann, on the other hand, has increased his fortune as a result of Richemont's consistent high-level performance. A report by highlights this fact, reporting that the company’s uptick in January was attributed to Richemont’s recent financial disclosures. The strong reaction increased the company's share price from $12.02 on January 17 to $13.47 on January 19, 2024. For Q4, 2023, Richemont demonstrated a solid performance that successfully offset reductions in Europe, driven by impressive results in China and the US.

title: Cleric Mulls Massive Investment In Ekiti To Curb Joblessness, Crime
creator: Adewumi Ademiju
description: In an effort to curtail unemployment, alarming rising crime rates and youth joblessness confronting the country, a cleric and the founder of Christ Apostolic Church (CAC), Grace of Mercy Prayer Mountain International Ministry also known as Adamimogo Global Outreach, Prophet Sam Olu-Alo, has expressed his determination to facilitate numerous investment opportunities to enable the youths...The post Cleric Mulls Massive Investment In Ekiti To Curb Joblessness, Crime first appeared on New Telegraph.The post Cleric Mulls Massive Investment In Ekiti To Curb Joblessness, Crime appeared first on New Telegraph.
content: In an effort to curtail unemployment, alarming rising crime rates and youth joblessness confronting the country, a cleric and the founder of Christ Apostolic Church (CAC), Grace of Mercy Prayer Mountain International Ministry also known as Adamimogo Global Outreach, Prophet Sam Olu-Alo, has expressed his determination to facilitate numerous investment opportunities to enable the youths in Ekiti State and the country to be meaningfully engaged for a better future. Olu-Alo declared that provision of job opportunities for the youth could not be left in the hands of the government alone, hence the need for philanthropists to step up and make contributions for the benefit of the nation and humanity. The cleric gave the assurance that he would always complement the government’s efforts in providing job opportunities for the teeming youths in the society, even as he expressed dissatisfaction over what he described as unpatriotic acts of some politicians and wealthy Nigerians over failure to assist unemployed youths and poor masses.

title: 헌재, ‘이정섭 탄핵 심판’ 조국당 강미정 증인 안 부른다
Σκυλακάκης: Μέχρι αρχές 2026 οι πρώτες ερευνητικές γεωτρήσεις για αέριο
description: Σημαντικές ευκαιρίες από τον κλάδο δέσμευσης και αποθήκευσης άνθρακα (CCS), όπως σημείωσε ο υπουργός ΠΕΝ σε εκδήλωση του «Φόρουμ Φυσικού Αερίου της ανατολικής Μεσογείου» (EMGF), το οποίο διεξάγεται στην Αθήνα.
content: Σκοπός του «Φόρουμ Φυσικού Αερίου της Ανατολικής Μεσογείου» ( ) είναι να συμβάλει σημείωσε ο Υπουργός Περιβάλλοντος και Ενέργειας, , στην ομιλία του στην εκδήλωση του EMGF που διεξάγεται στην Αθήνα. Όπως συμπλήρωσε, είναι σημαντικό ότι κάποια από τα ιδρυτικά μέλη του Φόρουμ πιστεύουν ότι μπορούν να παραμερίσουν τις διαφορές, για την ανάπτυξη συνεργειών στην παραγωγή και διακίνηση φυσικού αερίου, με δημιουργία κοινών υποδομών. Σύμφωνα με τον κ, Σκυλακάκη, το EMGF δρα σαν συνδετικός κρίκος μεταξύ των κυβερνήσεων, των ρυθμιστικών αρχών και των αγορών. Ήδη από συνέργειες μέσω του Οργανισμού έχουν ευνοηθεί η και το , ενώ υπάρχει η αισιοδοξία πως κάτι ανάλογο θα συμβεί σύντομα και στην περίπτωση της . , πρόσθεσε. Σε αυτό το πλαίσιο, το ελληνικό δίκτυο μπορεί να αναλάβει τη διαμετακόμιση ακόμη μεγαλύτερων ποσοτήτων καυσίμου στην , μέχρι τη , τη και την , δηλαδή τα τρία νέα μέλη του . Η δυναμικότητα μεταφοράς του μπορεί να αυξηθεί περαιτέρω, μέσω επενδύσεων. Σύμφωνα με τον κ. Σκυλακάκη, Υπογράμμισε πως η κατανάλωση του αερίου θα συνεχίσει να αυξάνεται τα επόμενα χρόνια, συμπληρώνοντας ωστόσο πως το αέριο αποτελεί Ωστόσο ο κλάδος θα έχει να διαδραματίσει ρόλο και στην εποχή της κλιματικά ουδέτερης οικονομίας, καθώς τα εξαντλημένα κοιτάσματα φυσικού αερίου θα μπορούν να μετατραπούν σε υποδομές αποθήκευσης CO2, ενώ οι υποδομές θα διακινούν πλέον ανανεώσιμα αέρια, από ορυκτό καύσιμο που μεταφέρουν τώρα. Τόνισε πως στην Ελλάδα . Η πρώτη από αυτές, η οποία βρίσκεται στον , αναπτύσσεται ήδη για την αποθήκευση εκπομπών. Το « » έχει επιχορηγηθεί μέσω του Ταμείου ανάκαμψης, ενώ θα μπορεί να αντλήσει επιπλέον ευρωπαϊκά κεφάλαια μέσω της πρόσφατης ένταξής του στα Ευρωπαϊκά Έργα Κοινού Ενδιαφέροντος. Όπως συμπλήρωσε ο Έλληνας ΥΠΕΝ, στην ευρύτερη περιοχή αναπτύσσονται μόνο δύο ανάλογες εγκαταστάσεις, στην και τη . Στο σύνολό τους, οι τρεις αυτές υποδομές δεν επαρκούν για την ικανοποίηση των αναγκών για αποθήκευση εκπομπών. Ως συνέπεια, θα πρέπει να αξιοποιηθούν ανάλογες υποδομές και σε γειτονικές χώρες εκτός Ε.Ε., όπως στην Αίγυπτο. Σε αυτό το πλαίσιο, είναι σημαντικό το EMGF να ενσωματώσει τη στρατηγική CCS στην ατζέντα του.

title: Παρατείνεται η 2η φάση του διαγωνισμού διάθεσης του 20% της Αριάδνη Interconnection
description: Η Αριάδνη Interconnection αποτελεί τον φορέα υλοποίησης της ηλεκτρικής διασύνδεσης Αττικής – Κρήτης.
content: Παρατείνεται έως τα μέσα Ιουλίου, κατόπιν αιτήματος των υποψηφίων, η 2η φάση του διαγωνισμού για τη διάθεση ποσοστού 20% της εταιρείας ειδικού σκοπού , που αποτελεί τον φορέα υλοποίησης της ηλεκτρικής διασύνδεσης Αττικής – Κρήτης. Τα υποψήφια επιχειρηματικά σχήματα θα μπορούν να υποβάλλουν τις οικονομικές προσφορές τους , ενώ στη συνέχεια θα ξεκινήσει η διαδικασία της αξιολόγησης από πλευράς ΑΔΜΗΕ. Υπενθυμίζεται ότι Κατά τη διεξαγωγή της 2ης φάσης του διαγωνισμού, έχει δοθεί στους υποψήφιους πρόσβαση στο Virtual Data Room (VDR) το οποίο περιλαμβάνει τα τεχνικά και οικονομικά στοιχεία της εταιρείας, καθώς και το υλικό εκείνο που κρίνεται αναγκαίο για τη διαμόρφωση των δεσμευτικών οικονομικών προσφορών των υποψηφίων. Η «Αριάδνη Interconnection ΑΕΕΣ» είναι 100% θυγατρική του ΑΔΜΗΕ. Η ηλεκτρική διασύνδεση Κρήτης – Αττικής Η ηλέκτριση της γραμμής διασύνδεση της Κρήτης με το ηπειρωτικό Σύστημα (Αττική) θα ξεκινήσει δοκιμαστικά στις αρχές του 2025, αφού έως το τέλος του τρέχοντος έτους θα έχουν ολοκληρωθεί οι κατασκευαστικές εργασίες. Το έργο θα τεθεί σε εμπορική λειτουργία το πρώτο εξάμηνο του 2025 και με την ολοκλήρωσή του, σε συνδυασμό με τη μικρή διασύνδεση Πελοποννήσου – Κρήτης που λειτουργεί αδιαλείπτως από το καλοκαίρι του 2021, αίρεται η ενεργειακή απομόνωση του νησιού και εξασφαλίζεται η ενεργειακή του ασφάλεια, πριν την έναρξη της θερινή σεζόν στη διάρκεια της οποίας η ζήτηση για ηλεκτρική ενέργεια κορυφώνεται. Παράλληλα, η Κρήτη καθίσταται πλέον ενεργειακός κόμβος σε συνδυασμό με τη μελλοντική επέκταση της διασύνδεσης προς Κύπρο και Ισραήλ, ενώ τίθενται οι βάσεις για την περαιτέρω «πράσινη» ανάπτυξή της με τη δημιουργία ηλεκτρικού χώρου της τάξης των 2,5 GW για την εγκατάσταση χερσαίων και υπεράκτιων έργων ΑΠΕ.

content: Dublin, May 28, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Global Electric Vehicle Battery Swapping Market" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. The global electric vehicle battery swapping market is poised for remarkable growth, with its valuation set to skyrocket from US$ 184.98 million in 2023 to an impressive US$ 901.71 million by 2030. This growth, at a CAGR of 25.82%, underscores the evolving landscape of electric vehicle (EV) infrastructure and technology. Key drivers of this market include the significant reduction in electric vehicle charging time and the surging demand for EVs amid inadequate public charging facilities. These factors are reshaping the way EVs are used and serviced. However, challenges such as the cost of installing charging stations, availability of charging hardware, high recycling costs, and battery pack design complexities are potential restraints in the market. In services, the Subscription (Rental) segment is experiencing the fastest growth, projecting a CAGR of over 26%. By vehicle type, the Passenger Car segment dominates, holding around 60% of the market share in 2023. The Asia Pacific region leads the market, holding the largest share of around 65% in 2023, with revenue of US$ 118.22 Mn. This dominance is primarily due to significant advancements and adoption in countries like China, India, and Japan. Other regions like North America, Europe, the Middle East & Africa, and South America are also contributing significantly, each with unique market dynamics and growth potentials. The market sees a competitive landscape with the cumulative market share of major players being close to 50%. Key players include Amara Raja, Amplify Mobility, BattSwap Inc., BYD Co. title: Hyderabad: Praja Bhavan gets bomb threat, cops carry out checks
creator: Telangana Today
description: Unidentified person calls police control room and informed that a bomb was placed on the premises
content: Home | Hyderabad | Hyderabad Praja Bhavan Gets Bomb Threat Cops Carry Out Checks Hyderabad: Praja Bhavan gets bomb threat, cops carry out checks Unidentified person calls police control room and informed that a bomb was placed on the premises By Telangana Today Updated On - 28 May 2024, 01:56 PM Praja Bhavan — File picture Hyderabad: The security personnel at Praja Bhavan at Somajiguda went into a tizzy after an unidentified person called the police control room and informed that a bomb was placed on the premises. Soon the bomb detection squads, anti sabotage teams, and the local police rushed to the spot and are carrying out checks in Praja Bhavan. Senior officials also visited the spot. The police are carrying out checks and barred entry onto the premises. content: Loading... Loading... Event moves into the spotlight of COMPUTEX 2024 in Taipei Newegg Commerce, Inc. NEGG , a leading global e-commerce company specializing in computers and consumer electronics, today announced its popular in-person PC building event, the PC Builder Competition, will return for a second year and move to a featured spot at COMPUTEX 2024. This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240528628899/en/ Newegg is hosting its PC Builder Competition on June 7 during COMPUTEX 2024. The company's first PC Builder Competition, seen here, was held in April 2023 in Taipei, Taiwan. (Photo: Newegg) The second annual Newegg PC Builder Competition will be open to all COMPUTEX attendees to watch for free on June 7, at 10 a.m. National Standard Time, in the Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center Hall 1, 4th Floor, Area M. During Newegg's 2024 PC Builder Competition on the final day of COMPUTEX, five Taiwan-based DIY PC assemblers will race against the clock and their fellow contestants to build the ultimate desktop PC system. Competitors will meticulously select parts from leading component manufacturers before beginning their ultimate PC build and showing off their expert assembly skills. Earlier this year, Newegg received over 1,400 applications for PC building fans who want to be among the five contestants. In April 2023, Newegg hosted its first PC Builder Competition with five teams rapidly building the ultimate desktop PC systems by picking their parts from Newegg's key component manufacturing partners. The 2023 event was hosted at Taipei's Syntrend Creative Park, a shopping district known for electronics, which attracted a sizable enthusiastic crowd to witness the inaugural PC building event. Viewers from all over the world who have watched popular cooking competitions may see some similarities for Newegg's high-energy event. The 2024 event winner will again be bestowed with a trophy and yearlong bragging rights as the ultimate Newegg PC Builder. Also, as an ultimate reward for their efforts, all competitors who successfully build a working desktop PC will get to keep their newly built system. However, competitors with a partially built system are expected to go home empty-handed. PC builds will be judged based on creativity, proper assembly to ensure the PC is fully functional and completion time. An audience of passionate tech enthusiasts and convention attendees will witness the competition in-person as it happens. Hosts will narrate the event in both English and Chinese. In addition, a monitor will show live PC building content and provide AI-translated subtitles. Contestants will vie to set a new PC Builder assembly record by trying to surpass the best time of 36 minutes, 2 seconds from last year's PC Builder winner. The Newegg PC Builder Competition will show how easy it is for anyone to put together the parts to build a desktop PC. PC Builder is not only the name of the Taiwan-based speed building contest but more recognized as Newegg's popular and innovative AI-based online tool that helps anyone order compatible PC parts from Newegg.com and then build a desktop PC system at home at their own pace. Loading... Loading... "Our first PC Builder event was a massive success, so we decided that COMPUTEX 2024, as an even bigger stage, is an even better venue to reach even more technology diehards and increase the overall impact of this exciting event," said Clare Lin, Senior Director of Newegg Taiwan. "The enthusiasm from our PC building community has already been overwhelming with the large number of applicants who want to show off their PC building skills. We can't wait to kick off our event at COMPUTEX and see the enthusiasm of fans for this fast-paced competition." About Newegg Newegg Commerce, Inc. NEGG , founded in 2001 and based in the City of Industry, Calif., near Los Angeles, is a leading global online retailer for PC hardware, consumer electronics, gaming peripherals, home appliances, automotive and lifestyle technology. Newegg also serves businesses' e-commerce needs with marketing, supply chain, and technical solutions in a single platform. For more information, please visit Newegg.com . Follow Newegg on X , TikTok , Instagram , Facebook , YouTube , Twitch , Threads and Discord . title: Det har gått prestige i Oderljunga skola
content: Oppositionen i kommunen är överens om att Oderljunga skola och fritidshem ska finnas kvar. Oppositionsrådet har tydligt presenterat på alla tänkbara pedagogiska sätt ett seriöst och hållbart alternativ, istället för att offra kommunens äldsta och enda landsbygdsskola. Skolan har en ökning med 29 procent fler elever till höstterminen. En fantastisk ökning. Kompetent, dedikerad, engagerad och behörig skolpersonal finns på skolan. Den 30 juni 2023 uttalade sig kommunstyrelsens ordförande Ronny Nilsson (S) i SVT såhär: ”Det är givetvis en tydlig signal när man får 521 namnunderskrifter på att man vill bevara Oderljunga skola och det vill alla, finns bara förutsättningarna så.” Ronny Nilsson, oppositionen har ju presenterat ett ekonomiskt hållbart alternativ, varför går du ut med ett ordförandemissiv på kommunstyrelsen den 15 maj om att Oderljunga skola och fritidshem ska läggas ned? Det klingar illa med ditt uttalande i SVT den 30 juni 2023 att alla vill ha kvar skolan och fritidshemmet om bara förutsättningarna finns. Förutsättningarna för att behålla skolan och fritidshemmet finns ju! Yrka avslag på ditt ordförandemissiv Ronny Nilsson, du är ju van att yrka avslag på dina egna förslag – för Perstorps bästa. Släpp prestigen.

title: Starlink internet takes preorders for Sri Lanka to launch service this year
creator: MIAP
description: Starlink internet takes preorders for Sri Lanka to launch service this yearThe post Starlink internet takes preorders for Sri Lanka to launch service this year appeared first on LNW Lanka News Web.
content: By: Staff Writer May 28, Colombo (LNW): Elon Musk’s satellite internet service is expected to launch services in Sri Lanka this year on an invitation extended by President Ranil Wickremasighe when he met the billionaire businessman in Bali Indonesia recently, according to official sources. Elon Musk’s Starlink internet is now open for pre-order in Sri Lanka, with the public able to reserve Starlink by paying a fully refundable US$ 99 deposit. Starlink aims to commence service in Sri Lanka in 2024, pending regulatory approval.Orders will be fulfilled on a first-come, first-served basis within each coverage area. Starlink’s Internet Constellation is one of the biggest breakthroughs in commercial satellite history. It brings nearly broadband-capable speeds and performance using a novel configuration of small satellites that work as a constellation while orbiting the Earth much lower than traditional satellites. As stated in an official tweet by SpaceX, Musk’s spacecraft company and the producer of Starlink, the broadband service is now available in 32 countries, including some parts of the US, Mexico, Germany, France and Spain. According to the map posted by Starlink, countries marked ‘available’ will receive their Starlink installation package immediately. The map also has areas marked ‘waitlist’ and ‘coming soon’. Among the countries marked ‘coming soon’ are Brazil, Saudi Arabia, Pakistan, India, Bangladesh. And Sri Lanka When entering Bangladesh as a pre-order service address on Starlink’s official website, the website brings up a deposit fee of $99, with a message saying that Starlink expects to expand service in the area in 2024. It also adds the disclaimer that availability is dependent on regulatory approval and that orders will be accepted on a first-come, first-serve basis within each coverage area. Starlink is a division of SpaceX that aims to provide high-speed, low-latency internet around the world. According to reports, Starlink services are especially effective in remote areas and places with little internet access. Starlink utilises overhead satellites to boost internet connections. With the purchase of a Starlink subscription, the user will be given a satellite dish and a router. The user can then set up the devices at home to receive signals from space. The dish can be installed on rooftops or in the backyard, and the router just needs to be connected to it. The setup of a Starlink home system is designed to be as simple as possible, with an Android and iOS Starlink app that can help users find the right location to mount the satellite dish. According to SpaceX, Starlink is currently providing about 150 Mbps download speed and 20 Mbps upload speed with latency below 30 ms. Musk claims that when additional satellites are launched, the download speed should double to about 300 Mbps. The first 60 Starlink satellites were released into orbit in May 2019. Since then, over 2,000 Starlink satellites have been launched, with the broadband service now being offered in 32 countries around the world.

title: Un herido en una colisión en la N-550 en Mos con cuatro vehículos implicados
description: Una persona resultó herida esta mañana en un accidente múltiple en Mos, con cuatro vehículos implicados. El siniestro ocurrió minutos antes de las 9 horas en la N-550 en Sanguiñeda, en el kilómetro 155 sentido Redondela.
content: El siniestro ocurrió minutos antes de las nueve de la mañana en Sanguiñeda Ambulancias en la entrada de Urgencias del Hospital Álvaro Cunqueiro. / Ricardo Grobas R. V. Una persona resultó herida esta mañana en un accidente múltiple en Mos, con cuatro vehículos implicados . El siniestro ocurrió minutos antes de las 9 horas en la N-550 en Sanguiñeda, en el kilómetro 155 sentido Redondela. Varios particulares llamaron al 112 para alertar de la colisión y, aunque en un primer momento algunos apuntaron a la posibilidad de que una persona estuviese atrapada en el interior de su vehículo, finalmente todos los afectados por el siniestro se encontraban liberados. El servicio gallego de emergencias alertó a Urxencias Sanitarias, Bomberos de O Porriño, Guardia Civil de Tráfico; Policía Local, Servicio de Emergencias y Protección Civil de Mos; y al servicio de mantenimiento de carretera para limpieza de la vía. sucesos sucesos en Galicia accidentes de tráfico heridos N-550 Noticia guardada en tu perfil Ver noticias guardadas 0 Lo más leído Lo último El mensaje de Jorge Javier a los 'Mozos de Arousa' por lo que ha ocurrido con su madre Sorpresa para Jesulín de Ubrique: la familia Janeiro anuncia que amplía la familia tras la llegada del bebé Tamara Falcó anuncia oficialmente que espera la llegada de un bebé en 2024 TardeAR' a la desesperada: recurre a uno de los grandes éxitos de 'Sálvame' para mantener a flote su audiencia Un conocido famoso se sincera sobre su paso por 'El Hormiguero' y el comportamiento de Pablo Motos: "Me estaban tirando cuchillos El último adiós a Sergio Sanlés Carlota Corredera se sincera sobre su situación económica tras su fulminante despido de Mediaset: "No tengo un trabajo, no tengo ingresos... title: Penava ima jasnu poruku o Pupovcu: ‘Ne želimo ni natruhe povezivanja s SDSS-om’
creator: Mia Peretić
description: Predsjednik Domovinskog pokreta Ivan Penava i predstavnici užeg predsjedništva te stranke održavaju konferenciju za novinare o političkim aktualnostima. Na pressici su članovi užeg predsjedništva stranke, a najavljeno je da će govoriti o političkim aktualnostima. Penava je se na početku osvrnuo na Dan hrvatske vojske i pripadnicima vojske čestitao njihov dan. Rekao je da su na [...]Objava Penava ima jasnu poruku o Pupovcu: ‘Ne želimo ni natruhe povezivanja s SDSS-om’ pojavila se prvi puta na Dnevno.hr.
content: Penava ima jasnu poruku o Pupovcu: ‘Ne želimo ni natruhe povezivanja s SDSS-om’ Predsjednik Domovinskog pokreta Ivan Penava i predstavnici užeg predsjedništva te stranke održali su konferenciju za novinare o političkim aktualnostima. Na pressici su bili članovi užeg predsjedništva stranke. Penava se na početku osvrnuo na Dan hrvatske vojske i pripadnicima vojske čestitao njihov dan. Rekao je da su na predsjedništvu razgovarali o radu klubova Sabora te da je klub stranke dobro ušao u novi saziv Sabora. “Peternel koordinira rad naših saborskih zastupnika. Unatoč dinamičnom tjednu, novi saziv Kluba DP-a na zadovoljavajući način ušao u novi saziv. Saborski zastupnici, koji su široj javnosti nepoznati, su ojačani, možemo se pohvaliti najmlađim zastupnicima otkako je samostalne Hrvatske, a iskorak smo napravili i što se tiče pripadnica ljepšeg spola. Iz početnih nastupa mogli ste vidjeti da je riječ o pametnim ljudima, koji se ne boje izraziti svoje stavove i zalagati se za dobrobit naroda”, rekao je Penava. Penava odlučan: SDSS ne može sudjelovati u vladajućoj većini Zatim je rekao da Domovinski pokret ostaje ustrajan u stavu da SDSS ni u kojem obliku ne može biti dio vladajuće većine. “Jasna je stvar, ne može biti govora o sudjelovanju SDSS-a kao političke stranke, ne pričamo o srpskoj nacionalnoj manjini, ne želimo ni natruhe povezivanja DP-a s SDSS-om. Elemenata SDSS-a ne može biti u većini u kojoj je Domovinski pokret”, rekao je Penava te odgovorio na pitanje što će DP napraviti ako HDZ ne bude odustao od Pupovca. “To su hipoteze, razgovori su pred nama. Naši stavovi su jasno komunicirani, na tome ćemo inzistirati, sve drugo bi bilo guranje DP-a i prevara birača”, zaključio je.

title: Ananya Panday’s Call Me Bae Release Date Revealed
creator: Devanshi Basu
description: Ever since Ananya Panday’s Call Me Bae was announced last year, fans have eagerly awaited its release date. Now, Amazon Prime Video has finally revealed when the show will be available to stream on its platform, and it’s soon. What is Ananya Panday’s Amazon Prime Video series Call Me Bae release date? Fans can now [...]The post Ananya Panday’s Call Me Bae Release Date Revealed appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
content: Ananya Panday’s Call Me Bae Release Date Revealed By Ever since was announced last year, fans have eagerly awaited its release date. Now, has finally revealed when the show will be available to stream on its platform, and it’s soon. What is Ananya Panday’s Amazon Prime Video series Call Me Bae release date? Fans can now mark their calendars! The , Call Me Bae, featuring Ananya Panday, will be available for streaming on Amazon Prime Video from . The streaming giant and Ananya Panday made this announcement on Instagram. Sharing a brand new poster of the actor, with the caption, “Update your calendars, things are about to glow up! #CallMeBaeOnPrime, Sept 6.” Call Me Bae introduces Ananya Panday as Bella “Bae” Chowdhary, marking her debut in the streaming world’s series section. For all those wondering what the upcoming series will be about, Amazon Prime Video has given a sneak peek. “Call Me Bae is the story of Bae. Who upon being downsized from heiress to hustler, discovers that her most valuable assets aren’t her diamonds, but her street smarts and style. Broke but refusing to be broken, she navigates the newsrooms of Mumbai. Finding beaus, behens, and her better self, ” the streaming giant. This 8-part series features Ananya Panday, Vir Das, Gurfateh Pirzada, and Varun Sood. Furthermore, Vihaan Samat, Muskkaan Jaferi, Niharika Lyra Dutt, Lisa Mishra, and Mini Mathur round up the ensemble. It is a Dharmatic Entertainment production. The series is backed by executive producers Karan Johar, Apoorva Mehta, and Somen Mishra. It is directed by Collin D’Cunha. For those unaware, Ananya Panday was last seen in the Netflix film Kho Gaye Hum Kahan, where she played the role of Ahana Singh. Now, following Call Me Bae, Panday is gearing up to appear in upcoming films like Control and Shankara and will also make a cameo in Bad Newz. When not obsessively writing about anything and everything related to cinema, you can catch her documenting nooks and crannies of Delhi. Share article Related

title: Andi gibirahan ang babaye sa usa ka viral video kauban si Philmar
description: Mipadayag sa iyang kasagmuyo si Andi Eigenmann batok sa babaye nga makita sa usa ka “friendly” video kauban si Philmar Alipayo. Sey ni Andi nga edited ang maong clip nga nag viral na karon “for some social media attention.” Gi-share sa TikTok sa content creator nga si Crissa Liaging ang video diin makita siya nga
content: Mipadayag sa iyang kasagmuyo si Andi Eigenmann batok sa babaye nga makita sa usa ka “friendly” video kauban si Philmar Alipayo. Sey ni Andi nga edited ang maong clip nga nag viral na karon “for some social media attention.” Gi-share sa TikTok sa content creator nga si Crissa Liaging ang video diin makita siya nga nakig-storya kang Philmar samtang nag atubang sila. Sa video makita nga murag mipaduol si Philmar kang Crissa samtang nagtan-aw sa iyang nawng. Iya usab nga gigunitan ang hawak sa maong babaye. READ: Andi sa chikang ‘divorced’ na sila ni Philmar: Helpppp Na-delete na ni Crissa sa iyang TikTok page ang maong video nga iyang gigamitan sa kanta nga “Weak” isip background music. Apan gi re-upload kini sa mga netizens mao nga nagpadayon ang pagkatap niini sa social media. READ: Andi, Philmar mi-postpone una sa ilang kasal human mamatay si Jaclyn Jose Sa iyang Instagram Stories niadtong Lunes, Mayo 27, miingon si Andi, “He can go out with his friends, go drinking every once in a while, and chat with whoever he wants. No harm in that.” READ: Gabby misaad nga mohatud ni Andi sa altar sa ilang kasal ni Philmar “What’s shameful is purposely posting and editing a video to cause a stir, disturbing the peace of people and dragging them into their negativity, just for some social media attention,” dugang niya. Sa laing TikTok video, giklaro ni Crissa nga wala siya makig flirt kang Philmar. Dugang niya nga naa sila sa usa ka lugar nga daghan og taw apan wala lang makita sa iyang video ang mga naa sa ilang palibot. Apan giangkon niya nga sayop ang iyang pag-post sa maong video nga na-misinterpret sa mga netizens. Sa laing bahin, mura og wala ray nahimo nga problema para nila ni Andi ug Philmar ang pagkatap sa viral video. Bag-o lang pud sila nag post og hulagway nilang duha nga kuha gikan sa ilang tindahan sa Siargao. Na-engage sila si Andi ug Philmar niadtong Disyembre 2020 og gikatakda na unta nga kaslon karong tuiga apan na postpone ang ilang kasal tungod sa pagkamatay sa inahan ni Andi na si Jaclyn Jose. Duna silay duha ka anak, sila si Lilo ug Koa.

title: TVS Supply Chain Solutions reports ₹5.4 cr PAT
description: Fourth quarter results of TVS Supply Chain Solutions includes other income of ₹6.75 crore
content: By BL Chennai Bureau Comments READ LATER TVS Supply Chain Solutions Ltd reported consolidated net profit of ₹5.40 crore for the quarter ended March 31, 2024, as against net loss of ₹9.4 crore in the corresponding quarter last year. The fourth quarter result includes other income of ₹6.75 crore, namely interest income from bank deposits, exchange fluctuation gains and other interest income from tax refunds and leases, sources said. Revenue was up 4.5 per cent to ₹2,426 crore during the quarter ended March 31, 2024, as against ₹2,321 crore in the same period last year. For the fiscal 2023-24, the company reported a net loss of ₹90 crore on reduced revenue of ₹9,199 crore, as against net profit of ₹42 crore on revenue of ₹9,994 crore in the previous year. During the year, there was ‘other income’ of ₹75.63 crore. The company operates in two segments — Integrated Supply Chain Solutions (ISCS); and Network Solutions (NS). For the full year, the consolidated revenue was lower by ₹794 crore compared to that of FY23, due to global trade cycle challenges in the NS segment. However, this was compensated by additional business from the ISCS segment, says a release. International conference on logistics begins at NITC FPOs should evolve as large corporate entities The adjusted EBITDA increased to ₹710 crore, a growth of 3.7 per cent. While the operating margins improved, the company reported loss after tax (before exceptional items) for the year at ₹31 crore, compared to profit (before exceptional items) of ₹58 crore in the previous year. This was driven by the effect of high interest costs in the first two quarters. The company returned to profit in the third quarter through growth in the ISCS segment, while the NS segment reflected stability in Q4. It also reduced debt to the tune of ₹1,195 crore, the release said. During the quarter, key new business wins included an Indian OEM in the commercial vehicle space, a defence contractor in the UK, and a leading water utility services company in the UK. EBITDA margin for ISCS in the current quarter was 9.6 per cent, a year-on-year increase of 40 bps. Ravi Viswanathan, Managing Director, TVS Supply Chain Solutions Ltd, said the quarterly and annual results reflect the consistent growth in the ISCS segment, and strong resilience despite major headwinds in the NS segment. At the time of filing this report, the company’s share price on the NSE was trading at ₹178.85, up by 0.35 per cent. Comments
